meanings: 경기 등에서 이길 be out of the running

vlive.korean: 그럼 저 체교과 가능성이 있는 건가요? Does that mean that I may be able to apply for a physical education major? 듣기 View video tvN D : 내신등급이 내 인생의 등급일까? [언어의 온도 : 우리의 열아홉] Ep.1
vlive.english: Does that mean that I may be able to apply for a physical education major?

vlive.korean: 어느 정도의 가능성과 그런... Exclude some options that don't have any possibilities. 듣기 View video AB6IX : 영미니와 퇴근해욤🥰❤
vlive.english: Exclude some options that don't have any possibilities.

vlive.korean: 그래도 소문 도는 거 보면 가능성이... But the rumors might mean there's a possibility... 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 내 인생 최악의 고백을 받았다 [연애미수] EP01 나도 이제 너 좋아한다고.
vlive.english: But the rumors might mean there's a possibility...

vlive.korean: 그 사람과 잘 될 가능성이 있는지 궁금하십니까? You want to know if you can go out with her? 듣기 View video Dingo Story / 딩고스토리 : 두 남자가 한 여자를 좋아할 때_EP10 [라이크(LIKE)]
vlive.english: You want to know if you can go out with her?

vlive.korean: 가능성이 없지만 도전하는 모습 정말 대단해요! There's a slim chance but I like your spirit of challenge! 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 💞 고백에 성공하는 법 [김요한 이야기] EP05 해피밤
vlive.english: There's a slim chance but I like your spirit of challenge!

examples.korean: The prospect of bankruptcy has now receded. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 파산의 가능성은 이제 희미해졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The prospect of bankruptcy has now receded. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Realistically, there is little prospect of a ceasefire. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 현실적으로 말해서, 휴전 가능성은 거의 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Realistically, there is little prospect of a ceasefire. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We were doubtful about the practicability of the plan. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 그 계획의 실현 가능성이 의심스러웠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We were doubtful about the practicability of the plan. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She accepted the prospect of her operation with equanimity. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 수술을 해야 할 가능성을 침착하게 받아들였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She accepted the prospect of her operation with equanimity. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Police investigating the train derailment have not ruled out sabotage. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 기차 탈선 사고를 조사하는 경찰은 사보타주(의 가능성)도 배제하지 않고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Police investigating the train derailment have not ruled out sabotage. Add to Wordbook
